title: Citibank to Open Three New Branches in Miami Metro Area
summary: Miami, Fla. – As part of its commitment to provide superior products and services and expand its retail distribution network, Citibank will open three new branches in the Miami Metro area over the coming months.
tag-1: Citibank to Open Three New Branches in Miami Metro Area
tag-2: Miami, Fla. – As part of its commitment to provide superior products and services and expand its retail distribution network, Citibank will open three new branches in the Miami Metro area over the coming months.
tag-3: Similar to Citibank's innovative flagship branch in New York City, which opened in December 2011, the new Miami branches will feature digital merchandising, envelope-free ATMs and online account access. The branches will also showcase a differentiated level of customer service from highly trained staff.
tag-4: "Citibank is thrilled to expand our presence in Florida," said Ken Kavanagh, Regional Executive, Local Markets, Citibank. "The new branches reflect our consumer banking strategy to invest in our U.S. retail banking franchise with a focus on customer-centric innovations and an eye towards growth in our key markets," he continued.
tag-5: The new branches will be located at:
tag-6: Each of the new branches will service retail, small business, commercial banking, wealth management and mortgage customers with account opening and teller services, as well as 24-hour banking with drive-through and lobby ATM's. The branches will also provide Citi's premium banking services through its Citigold offering.
tag-7: Citibank representatives will be able to assist customers in English and Spanish. Branch hours will vary by location. The Weston Country Isles branch will be open Monday through Friday, 9 a.m. - 6 p.m., and Saturday from 9 a.m. - 1 p.m. Customers can also conduct their banking through Citibank Online, Citi Mobile and Citi Phone Banking.
tag-8: Citibank Citibank is a member of Citi®, the leading global financial services company, which has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Through Citicorp and Citi Holdings, Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management. Additional information may be found at www.citigroup.com.
